name: Acf-codemirror-area-field-type
body:
### CodeMirror Textarea Field Type for the Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) WordPress Plugin

This is just a start. This is based off of [Advanced Custom Fields - Code Area Field](https://wordpress.org/plugins/advanced-custom-fields-code-area-field/), which didn't work with the most recent version of ACF Pro (5.3.3.2 at the time of writing).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
